title: Phishing campaign targets freight and logistics orgs in the US, Europe
summary: A financially motivated threat group dubbed "Diesel Vortex" is stealing credentials from freight and logistics operators in the U.S. and Europe in phishing attacks using 52 domains. [...]

title: Wynn Resorts confirms employee data breach after extortion threat
summary: Wynn Resorts has confirmed that a hacker stole employee data from its systems after the company was listed on the ShinyHunters extortion gang's data leak site. [...]

title: 1Campaign platform helps malicious Google ads evade detection
summary: A newly identified cybercrime service known as 1Campaign is enabling threat actors to run malicious Google Ads that remain online for extended periods while evading scrutiny from security researchers. [...]

title: CarGurus data breach exposes information of 12.4 million accounts
summary: The ShinyHunters extortion group has published personal information in more than 12 million records allegedly stolen from CarGurus, a U.S.-based digital auto platform. [...]

title: Microsoft adds Copilot data controls to all storage locations
summary: Microsoft is expanding data loss prevention (DLP) controls to block the Microsoft 365 Copilot AI assistant from processing confidential Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents, regardless of their location. [...]

title: Identity-First AI Security: Why CISOs Must Add Intent to the Equation
summary: AI agents now provision infrastructure and approve actions, but many inherit over-scoped privileges without proper governance. Token Security explains why CISOs must treat agents as identities and add intent-based controls so access is granted only when purpose and context align. [...]

title: UK fines Reddit $19 million for using children’s data unlawfully
summary: The UK Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) has fined Reddit £14.47 million (over $19.5 million) for collecting and using the personal information of children under 13 without adequate safeguards. [...]

title: Critical SolarWinds Serv-U flaws offer root access to servers
summary: SolarWinds has patched four critical Serv-U remote code execution vulnerabilities that could grant attackers root access to unpatched servers. [...]

title: ShinyHunters extortion gang claims Odido breach affecting millions
summary: The ShinyHunters extortion gang has claimed responsibility for breaching Dutch telecommunications provider Odido and stealing millions of user records from its compromised systems. [...]

title: North Korean Lazarus group linked to Medusa ransomware attacks
summary: North Korean state-backed hackers associated with the Lazarus threat group are targeting U.S. healthcare organizations in extortion attacks using the Medusa ransomware. [...]
